description: This is a Java interface extending JpaRepository, defining custom query methods for managing Recipe entities, including searches by title, description, and category.

classes.name: RecipeRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for Recipe entities with custom search methods based on title, description, and category.

methods.name: findByTitleContainingIgnoreCaseOrDescriptionContainingIgnoreCase
methods.description: Finds recipes where the title or description contains specified strings, ignoring case, with pagination.

methods.name: findByCategory_Id
methods.description: Finds recipes associated with a specific category ID, with pagination.

methods.name: findByCategory_IdAndTitleContainingIgnoreCaseOrCategory_IdAndDescriptionContainingIgnoreCase
methods.description: Finds recipes by category ID and either title or description containing specified strings, ignoring case, with pagination.
